name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: A persistent identifier for the bundle that won't change as a bundle is copied from server to server.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A persistent identifier for the bundle that won't change as a bundle is copied from server to server.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: Indicates the purpose of this bundle - how it is intended to be used.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates the purpose of this bundle - how it is intended to be used.

name: $timestamp
desc: Returns: The date/time that the bundle was assembled - i.e. when the resources were placed in the bundle.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date/time that the bundle was assembled - i.e. when the resources were placed in the bundle.

name: $total
desc: Returns: If a set of search matches, this is the total number of entries of type 'match' across all pages in the search.  It does not include search.mode = 'include' or 'outcome' entries and it does not provide a count of the number of entries in the Bundle.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: If a set of search matches, this is the total number of entries of type 'match' across all pages in the search.  It does not include search.mode = 'include' or 'outcome' entries and it does not provide a count of the number of entries in the Bundle.

name: $link
desc: Returns: A series of links that provide context to this bundle.

name: $addlink
desc: A series of links that provide context to this bundle.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A series of links that provide context to this bundle.

name: $entry
desc: Returns: An entry in a bundle resource - will either contain a resource or information about a resource (transactions and history only).

name: $addentry
desc: An entry in a bundle resource - will either contain a resource or information about a resource (transactions and history only).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: An entry in a bundle resource - will either contain a resource or information about a resource (transactions and history only).

name: $signature
desc: Returns: Digital Signature - base64 encoded. XML-DSig or a JWT.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Digital Signature - base64 encoded. XML-DSig or a JWT.
